meanings.definition: A toxic oil found in plants such as poison ivy and poison oak.
meanings.sent1: Urushiols from poison ivy can cause a rash.
meanings.sent2: Be careful, urushiols in poison oak can make your skin red and itchy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous urushiols in poison ivy played a trick on my skin.
meanings.sent4: The urushiols seemed like tiny villains, causing havoc on my skin.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the burning sensation caused by urushiols from poison ivy.

meanings.definition: A substance that can cause skin irritation and allergic reactions.
meanings.sent1: Avoid touching plants with urushiols to prevent itching.
meanings.sent2: Some people are more sensitive to urushiols and develop a rash easily.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky urushiols made my skin feel like it was under attack.
meanings.sent4: Her skin reacted as if it had encountered an army of urushiols.
meanings.sent5: The urushiols left a lasting mark on my skin, reminding me to be cautious.
